Html: I'm trying to use this library in a Windows Phone 8 project, because I read that the Silverlight binaries are compatibles. I tried reference the binaries and import the source, but for both of them it says that I can't do it because it's incompatible with my project. How can I use tis library then?

I am facing the same issue as well. I am using VS 2013 and .Net framework 4.5 (tried 4.5.1 too) for my project. I get this error when I try to add the reference to the Silverlight MetroChart.dll

Image link: http://1drv.ms/1rgQHaq

It seems from the other posts on the topic that it is possible to add Silverlight binaries to the WP8 project. Some guidance or sample project would be highly appreciated.
